description: Each time you get hit, you drop a coin or two
REPENTANCE - No longer guaranteed to drop coins as The Keeper
t1.title: Swallowed Penny
t1.subtitle: Gulp!
t1.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #15 (Slow Roll)

description: While held, Isaac has a significantly higher chance to find drops when breaking poops
t2.title: Petrified Poop
t2.subtitle: It feels lucky?

description: Lowers your spacebar item charge rate by 1
Cannot lower the charge of your spacebar item below 1 room
For example, you will now be able to use a 3 room charge item after 2 rooms instead
t3.title: AAA Battery
t3.subtitle: Trickle charge

description: Does the teleport effect every time you use your current spacebar item
Can be used infinitely every room if you have Guppy's Paw and no red heart containers (Can be exploited to get to the boss room without clearing any other rooms)
t4.title: Broken Remote
t4.subtitle: It's broken

description: Higher chance for champion enemies while held
t5.title: Purple Heart
t5.subtitle: Challenge up

description: Has a partial Magneto effect and will attract coins, pulling them into Isaac from a distance
Does not attract other pickups like the full Magneto item does
t6.title: Broken Magnet
t6.subtitle: It kinda works

description: Increases your chances to find an Angel Room instead of a Devil Room
Normally there is a 50%/50% chance of a Angel or Devil room with if a door spawns after the boss. The Rosary Bead changes this to a 75%/25% chance of an angel or devil room (respectively)
t7.title: Rosary Bead
t7.subtitle: Faith up

description: When Isaac takes damage, there is a chance he will gain the Gamekid effect, turning him invincible and dealing contact damage to any enemies he touches
The chance to activate the invincibility effect is affected by your luck stat and at +38 Luck it will activate every time you get hit
t8.title: Cartridge
t8.subtitle: I remember these

description: Tears shrink and grow in size as they go across the room
Does not appear to affect your damage and only the hitbox size of tears
t9.title: Pulse Worm
t9.subtitle: Wub wub!

description: Tears now move in a wave fashion across the room
Grants spectral tears
+0.4 Tears up
t10.title: Wiggle Worm
t10.subtitle: Wiggle wiggle!

description: While held, tears move in a spiral pattern across the screen at high speed
Grants spectral tears
Effectively increases your range due to the tear pattern
t11.title: Ring Worm
t11.subtitle: Woop woop!

description: Tears become flat and disc shaped giving them a larger hitbox
Higher knockback effect with your tears
t12.title: Flat Worm
t12.subtitle: Blub blub!

description: While this trinket is held, all items in the Shop cost 0 coins
After buying any 0 cent item in the Shop, the trinket disappears
t13.title: Store Credit
t13.subtitle: YES!
t13.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Lazarus

description: Isaac no longer takes damage from walking over spikes and blood creep while this trinket is held
t14.title: Callus
t14.subtitle: Your feet feel stronger

description: 33% chance to drop a coin for every rock that you destroy
REPENTANCE - Previously was 100%, now 33%
t15.title: Lucky Rock
t15.subtitle: There's something inside
t15.unlock: Unlock this item by destroying 100 rocks

description: Mom's Leg will now appear every 60 seconds and stomp down randomly in the room dealing 300 damage to enemies, similar to how Daddy Longlegs works but less frequent
Be warned though, Mom's leg can also stomp and hurt Isaac too!
t16.title: Mom's Toenail

description: Increases the chance for Black hearts to spawn
t17.title: Black Lipstick
t17.subtitle: Evil up
t17.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Eve

description: Gives you a higher chance of eternal hearts
Contrary to popular belief, the Bible Tract doesn't allow Angel Rooms to appear after paying for a Devil Deal
t18.title: Bible Tract
t18.subtitle: Faith up

description: Allows you to unlock golden chests without needing a key
Does not work on locked rooms
Cain starts with this trinket after donating 68 coins to the Greed Donation Machine
t19.title: Paper Clip
t19.subtitle: Master of lockpicking

description: When you reach half a heart of life remaining, a black heart will spawn
After three black hearts have spawned, the trinket dissapears
t20.title: Monkey's Paw
t20.subtitle: Wish granted

description: Imitates the behaviours of some of the other 'paper' items/trinkets
A Missing Page: When taking damage, Isaac has a chance to deal damage to the entire room in a Necronomicon style effect
Has a chance to trigger the Polaroid or Negative effect every time you take damage with half a red heart or less

Missing Poster: Dying in a sacrifice room while holding this trinket will reveal a puzzle piece on the death screen. Finding all the puzzle pieces will help you to reveal the final secret, unlocking the hidden character 'The Lost'
If held when you touch the chest after the Satan or Isaac fight and you don't have the relevant item to go to the next floor (Polaroid or Negative), you have a small chance to be taken there anyway
t21.title: Mysterious Paper
t21.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Eden

description: Every time a heart would spawn, it becomes a key instead.
Hearts turn into black hearts. This doesn't convert hearts that dropped before picking up this trinket, and doesn't apply to set hearts, i.e. the eternal hearts that drop in angel rooms
t22.title: Daemon's Tail
t22.subtitle: Evil up
t22.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Azazel

description: Dying in a sacrifice room while holding this trinket will unlock The Lost character
After The Lost is unlocked, dying anywhere with this trinket will bring you back to life as The Lost and the trinket will be deleted
When playing as Tainted Lost, you don't swap to being regular Lost, it simply acts as an extra life
t23.title: Missing Poster
t23.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Dark Room with Isaac

description: Everytime you pick up a coin, you fart
t24.title: Butt Penny
t24.subtitle: Wealth of gas

description: Causes Isaac to create poops randomly
t25.title: Mysterious Candy
t25.subtitle: Uh-oh!

description: Tears now move forwards at right angles, shifting left and right across the room
Grants spectral tears
Increases your range stat by +10.0 while held but due to the fire pattern, your tears travel a similar distance to normal
t26.title: Hook Worm
t26.subtitle: Zip zoop!

description: +0.5 Shot Speed Up
Your tears now whip across the room at a very high shot speed
Shot speed gives your tears more effective range, but doesn't increase your range stat directly
t27.title: Whip Worm
t27.subtitle: Wooosh!

description: Has a 22.22% chance to respawn with 3 Soul hearts as Blue Baby when you die
t28.title: Broken Ankh
t28.subtitle: Eternal life?
t28.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Lazarus

description: Everytime Isaac takes damage, one blue fly will spawn
t29.title: Fish Head
t29.subtitle: It stinks

description: Isaac's tears have a chance to poison enemies
The poison effect leaves a damage over time, which deals 4 or 6 damage per tick
The chance to poison enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +18 Luck it will activate every time
t30.title: Pinky Eye
t30.subtitle: Poison shots

description: Isaac now has a chance to make a spectral and piercing tear
The chance to fire a piercing tear is affected by your luck stat and at +18 Luck it will activate every time
t31.title: Push Pin
t31.subtitle: Piercing shots

description: While held, this trinket gives a random mushroom effect each room
Possible mushrooms include: Mini Mush, Odd Mushroom (Thin), Odd Mushroom (Thick), The Compass
t32.title: Liberty Cap
t32.subtitle: Touch fuzzy, get dizzy!

description: While at 1/2 a red heart of health, you gain a Little Steve familiar that follows you and shoots homing tears
REPENTANCE - Umbilical Cord now has a high chance to spawn a Gemini familiar for the room when Isaac takes damage. This effect is stackable
t33.title: Umbilical Cord
t33.subtitle: Fetal protection

description: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find hearts from drops after clearing a room and from chests
t34.title: Child's Heart
t34.subtitle: It calls out to its brothers

description: +2 Damage Up
t35.title: Curved Horn
t35.subtitle: DMG up
t35.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Judas

description: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find keys and chests
t36.title: Rusted Key
t36.subtitle: It feels lucky?

description: +0.15 Speed Up
t37.title: Goat Hoof
t37.subtitle: Speed up

description: Grants a secondary chance of any non-specific heart drop turning into a soul heart
t38.title: Mom's Pearl
t38.subtitle: It emanates purity

description: -2 Tear Delay (Tears Up)
The fire rate increase is applied in such a way that the higher your tear stat is, the more effective Cancer is
Breaks the normal fire rate cap, allowing you to fire faster than the normal maximum
t39.title: Cancer
t39.subtitle: Yay, cancer!

description: You have a chance when taking damage to gain +1.8 Damage Up for the rest of the room
t40.title: Red Patch
t40.subtitle: Your rage grows

description: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find bombs
Picking up the Match Stick is the only way to remove the Tick trinket
t41.title: Match Stick
t41.subtitle: Tastes like burning

description: +1 Luck Up while held
t42.title: Lucky Toe
t42.subtitle: Luck up!
t42.unlock: Unlock this item by blowing up 20 shop keepers (this includes the ones in the secret room)

description: When you take damage while on 1/2 a heart, you are teleported back to the previous room
t43.title: Cursed Skull
t43.subtitle: Cursed?

description: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find pills
t44.title: Safety Cap
t44.subtitle: Don't swallow it

description: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find Tarot cards after clearing a room or from chests
t45.title: Ace of Spades
t45.subtitle: Luck of the draw

description: After clearing a room, you have a chance to heal for half a red heart
t46.title: Isaac's Fork
t46.subtitle: Consume thy enemy

description: When taking damage, Isaac has a chance to deal damage to the entire room in a Necronomicon style effect
The chance to damage enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +50 or more Luck it will activate 50% of the time
t48.title: A Missing Page
t48.subtitle: It glows with power

description: Everytime you pick up a penny, you have a chance to spawn a red heart on the floor
t49.title: Bloody Penny
t49.subtitle: Wealth of health
t49.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Samson

description: Everytime you pick up a coin, you have a 25% chance to spawn a bomb on the floor
t50.title: Burnt Penny
t50.subtitle: Wealth of chaos
t50.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #13 (Beans!)

description: Everytime you pick up a coin, you have a 25% chance to spawn a key
t51.title: Flat Penny
t51.subtitle: Wealth of answers

description: When picking up a coin, you have a chance to automatically gain one more coin
t52.title: Counterfeit Penny
t52.subtitle: Wealth of wealth
t52.unlock: Unlock this item by playing the shell game in the arcade 100 times

description: When you enter a boss room, immediately remove 15% health from the boss and restore 1 red heart

This trinket cannot be dropped by holding the drop key or picking up other trinkets. The only way to remove it is via having a second trinket slot (Mom's Purse, Belly Button) or absorbing it (Marbles, Smelter, Gulp! pill) or picking up the Match Stick trinket, which will burn it off you
t53.title: Tick
t53.subtitle: Well, that's not coming off

description: While held, this trinket gives Isaac a familiar that shoots piercing tears that deal 3.5 damage
t54.title: Isaac's Head
t54.subtitle: Dead friend
t54.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Boss Rush with Isaac

description: At the start of a new floor, you get an eternal heart
t55.title: Maggy's Faith
t55.subtitle: Faith's reward
t55.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Maggy

description: Items which cost 2 heart containers in a deal with the devil are reduced to only cost 1 heart
t56.title: Judas' Tongue
t56.subtitle: Payment received
t56.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Judas

description: Creates a familiar which moves around the room in a similar fashion to The Peeper, shooting tears in the same direction as Isaac
t57.title: ???'s Soul
t57.subtitle: Imaginary friend
t57.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Blue Baby

description: When you kill an enemy, you have a chance to get +0.5 damage up for the current room
t58.title: Samson's Lock
t58.subtitle: Your rage grows
t58.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Samson

description: Gives a 25% chance to reveal map icons at the start of a new floor (The same effect as the Compass)
t59.title: Cain's Eye
t59.subtitle: May you see your destination
t59.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Cain

description: When you kill an enemy, you have a chance to spawn a transparent Dead Bird familiar
The Dead Bird familiar deals 2 damage per tick to enemies while in contact with them
t60.title: Eve's Bird Foot
t60.subtitle: Revenge from beyond
t60.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Isaac boss with Eve

description: Replaces chest spawns with red chests
REPENTANCE - No longer replaces chests that have already spawned
t61.title: The Left Hand
t61.subtitle: The left hand path reaps dark rewards
t61.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Ultra Pride

description: While held, tinted rocks and rocks with a crawlspace below them will flash white every 10 seconds
t62.title: Shiny Rock
t62.subtitle: It shines for it's brothers

description: Turns all troll bombs into bombs which you can pick up and use
Super Troll bombs turn into 1+1 free double bomb pickups
t63.title: Safety Scissors
t63.subtitle: Fuse cutter

description: Gives your tears a random worm effect every few seconds
The possible tear effects include: Whip Worm, Ring Worm, Wiggle Worm, Flat Worm, Hook Worm, Pulse Worm, Tape Worm and Lazy Worm
t64.title: Rainbow Worm
t64.subtitle: Bleep bloop blop

description: While held, Tape Worm doubles your range stat and halves your tear height stat
t65.title: Tape Worm
t65.subtitle: Floooooooooop!

description: -0.4 Shot Speed Down
+4.0 Range Up
+2.0 Tear Height
t66.title: Lazy Worm
t66.subtitle: Pft

description: Every time you get hit, you have a chance to activate the D6, D20, D8 or D12 effect
t67.title: Cracked Dice
t67.subtitle: You feel cursed... kinda.
t67.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greed Mode with ???

description: While held this trinket causes all pickups and enemies to move slowly towards you
Will also attract the Mom's Foot and Ultra Greed door entities
t68.title: Super Magnet
t68.subtitle: It pulls

description: Randomly Isaac will gain a camouflage for a few seconds and all enemies in the current room will have a confused status effect applied to them
This trinket can be used to open the door to Mausoleum in Depths II
t69.title: Faded Polaroid
t69.subtitle: You feel faded

description: Gives a small chance to spawn a friendly attack spider while in a hostile room with enemies
t70.title: Louse
t70.subtitle: Itchy, tasty...

description: Leaves a pool of green creep under all bombs you place, which damages enemies that walk over it
t71.title: Bob's Bladder
t71.subtitle: Creepy bombs

description: Gives a +6.66% chance of a getting a small battery after clearing a room
Gives a +2.0% chance for pickups to be small batteries
Gives a +5.0% chance to add an extra charge to your active item after clearing a room
t72.title: Watch Battery
t72.subtitle: Lil charge

description: Exploding bombs now have a chance to drop another bomb that you can pick up
t73.title: Blasting Cap
t73.subtitle: Pop! Pop!

description: Higher chance to find crawl spaces when exploding rocks
t74.title: Stud Finder
t74.subtitle: The ground below feels hollow...
t74.unlock: Unlock this trinket by beating Challenge #27 (Brains)

description: Gives a different trinket effect per room, randomly choosing between any of the other available trinkets in the game
Each room is locked to a specific trinket effect, meaning if you exit and re-enter a room, that specific room will always have the same effect.
t75.title: Error
t75.subtitle: Effect not found?

description: Chests now have a 50/50 chance to either pay out with extra consumables or nothing/an enemy
t76.title: Poker Chip
t76.subtitle: It's double down time!
t76.unlock: Unlock this trinket by beating Challenge #26 (I Rule)

description: Tears have a stronger knockback effect while this trinket is held
t77.title: Blister
t77.subtitle: Bounce back!

description: Increases the time that status effects stay on enemies. e.g. With poison effects, the damage over time poison will last for much longer.
t78.title: Second Hand
t78.subtitle: Extended stat effect time

description: While held there is a small chance when using a tarot card or pill that a copy of it will be dropped on the floor next to you
t79.title: Endless Nameless
t79.subtitle: I'm stuck in a loop...

description: +0.2 Damage Up for each 'evil' item you have
Items classed as evil in this case are Black Candle, Ceremonial Robes, Abaddon, Goat Head, Match Book, Missing Page 2, Safety Pin
t80.title: Black Feather
t80.subtitle: With darkness comes power
t80.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greed Mode with Eve

description: Invincibility lasts longer after getting hit (Increased i-frames)
This makes it possible to use the Blood Donation machine twice from one hit of damage
t81.title: Blind Rage
t81.subtitle: Blind to damage
t81.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Blue Womb (Hush) with Samson

description: +15% chance to get a double item room to spawn on the next floor
If the effect activates, two items spawn in your item room, however only one can be taken (Same effect as the More Options item)
The chance doubles to +30% with the effect from Mom's Box
t82.title: Golden Horse Shoe
t82.subtitle: Feel lucky?

description: Automatically opens all shop room doors for free
t83.title: Store Key
t83.subtitle: Stores are open
t83.unlock: Keeper starts with this trinket after beating Satan with Keeper

description: Forces the Greed and Super Greed mini bosses to no longer appear in shops or secret rooms
Holding Rib of Greed increase your chance to receive coin drops
t84.title: Rib of Greed
t84.subtitle: Feels greedy
t84.unlock: Unlock this trinket by beating Ultra Greed with Keeper

description: Donating to a Donation Machine has a chance to heal Isaac for a full red heart or spawn a Beggar
t85.title: Karma
t85.subtitle: Karma up
t85.unlock: Unlock this item by beating The Lamb boss with Keeper

description: Destroying poops now gives you a blue fly
t86.title: Lil Larva
t86.subtitle: the poop is moving...

description: While held, you heal for half a red heart every time you use a key to open a door or golden chest
Changes all half red hearts into full hearts
t87.title: Mom's Locket
t87.subtitle: you feel her love

description: While this trinket is held you have a significantly lower chance to find spacebar/active items
It will cause passive items to spawn except when the game cannot generate any more passive items and will then instead choose spacebar/active items
Some hard coded spacebar items from bosses and mini-bosses (i.e. Krampus Head) can still spawn
Bible drops caused by the Rosary item are not prevented by this trinket
t88.title: NO!
t88.subtitle: Never again!

description: Causes your familiars to stay closer to each other
t89.title: Child Leash
t89.subtitle: Keep your friends close...

description: Poop in the environment will now explode when destroyed
t90.title: Brown Cap
t90.subtitle: Fartoom!

description: While held you have an increased chance for Black Poops to spawn, which deal damage to all enemies in the room when destroyed
Gives The Poop active item a chance to spawn a Black Poop too
t91.title: Meconium
t91.subtitle: Eww
t91.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Greedier Mode with ???

description: Gives you extra stat upgrades based on the items you've already collected that have stat increases, at +20% of the item's original increase
REPENTANCE - Reduced Cracked Crown's stat bonuses to +20% (from +33%) and removed the flat independent tears upgrade from it
t92.title: Cracked Crown
t92.subtitle: Boost Stats

description: While held, gives the Skatole effect only in certain rooms, which will turn hostile flies to neutral and stop others from shooting
Attack, Dart and Ring Flies turn into neutral Black Flies and Pooters and Fat Flies will no longer fire at you
t93.title: Used Diaper
t93.subtitle: You Stink

description: Items and trinkets which generate blue flies and spiders will have double the effect, causing twice as many to spawn
t94.title: Fish Tail
t94.subtitle: It also stinks!

description: Some tears will randomly become a black tooth, that deal double your normal tear damage and can poison enemies
t95.title: Black Tooth
t95.subtitle: It looks dead

description: Tears become spectral and travel in a large spiral pattern
+4.0 Range Up
t96.title: Ouroboros Worm
t96.subtitle: Foop foop!

description: Every time you take damage you have a very small chance to gain a Tonsil familiar, which follows you and blocks enemy projectiles
This effect can happen twice before the Tonsil trinket is destroyed
Does not deal contact damage to enemies
t97.title: Tonsil
t97.subtitle: Sick...

description: Your tears have a random chance to become booger tears
Booger tears stick on to enemies and deal periodic poison damage until they die or 60 seconds passes. Each tick of poison damage is equal to your normal tear damage
The boogers will have a homing effect
t98.title: Nose Goblin
t98.subtitle: Seems magic...

description: Some random tears will gain the Rubber Cement effect and become bouncy
t99.title: Super Ball
t99.subtitle: Boing!

description: Grants +0.25 Speed, +0.75 Range, +0.1 Shot Speed, +0.2 Tears, +0.5 Damage and +1 Luck when Isaac's active item is fully charged
Infinite use items such as Potato Peeler count as charged and provide the bonus from this trinket
t100.title: Vibrant Bulb
t100.subtitle: It needs power

description: Grants +0.5 Speed, +1.5 Range, +0.3 Shot Speed, +0.4 Tears, +1.5 Damage when Isaac's active item is completely uncharged
One-time use items such as Mama Mega count as uncharged and provide the bonus from this trinket
t101.title: Dim Bulb
t101.subtitle: I think it's broken

description: Gives you another secret room on each new floor while held
Does not spawn more than one super secret room, only the normal secret room
t102.title: Fragmented Card
t102.subtitle: Double moon

description: When you have the same amount of coins, bombs and keys, half consumables turn into their doubled version
This effect works for any number of consumables, including 0 and 99, as long as the count for coins/keys/bombs is equal
t103.title: Equality!

description: Every time you take damage you have a very small chance to spawn a random pedestal item
When the effect triggers, the trinket is destroyed
t104.title: Wish Bone
t104.subtitle: Make a wish

description: Every time you take damage you have a very small chance to spawn the Lunch item, which gives +1 HP up
When the effect triggers, this trinket is destroyed
t105.title: Bag Lunch
t105.subtitle: I wonder what it is

description: Increases the radius of any creep you produce
t106.title: Lost Cork
t106.subtitle: Uncorked

description: While held, any damage taken remove red hearts first, before soul hearts, black hearts and rotten heart damage
While at 1/2 of a red heart, it will begin to remove your other hearts again
t107.title: Crow Heart
t107.subtitle: Drain me
t107.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greedier mode with Eve

description: The Walnut has a chance to break when taking damage from an explosion. If it does, it will drop a random trinket, coin, heart and key
The Walnut trinket is destroyed once the effect activates
t108.title: Walnut
t108.subtitle: Thats a hard nut to crack!

description: Causes any orbitals you have to stop moving while held
Stops shooting familiars from moving (including Lilith's Incubus)
Some familiars with irregular movement are not affected by Duct Tape, such as Abel, BBF, Bumbo, Guppy's Hair Ball, Lil Gurdy, Punching Bag, Robo-Baby 2.0, Succubus
t109.title: Duct Tape
t109.subtitle: Stuck!

description: While held, shops will now appear on the womb floors (The Womb, Utero and Scarred Womb)
t110.title: Silver Dollar
t110.subtitle: Feels lucky...

description: While held, item rooms now appear on the womb floors (The Womb, Utero and Scarred Womb)
REPENTANCE - Causes item rooms to appear on Corpse floors
t111.title: Bloody Crown
t111.subtitle: Drips with blood...
t111.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Samson

description: While held, restock boxes will always spawn in item rooms
t112.title: Pay To Win

description: Upon entering a room with enemies, spawns a Red Locust which detonates upon impact with enemies, dealing double tear damage for the impact of the Locust and 60 damage for the explosion
Can be dangerous as the fly will target the nearest enemy, which can be close enough to catch Isaac in its blast radius
t113.title: Locust of War
t113.subtitle: I Bring Wrath
t113.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Isaac in the Cathedral as Apollyon

description: At the start of each new hostile room you spawn a green attack fly, which will target a nearby enemy, deal double your tear damage and then poison them

t114.subtitle: I Bring Pestilence
t114.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Apollyon

description: At the start of each new hostile room you spawn a yellow attack fly, which will target a nearby enemy, deal double your tear damage and apply a slowing effect to it
t115.title: Locust of Famine
t115.subtitle: I bring Famine

t116.title: Locust of Death
t116.subtitle: I bring Death
t116.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating The Lamb as Apollyon

description: At the start of each new hostile room you spawn 2-5 white attack flies, which will target a nearby enemy and deal double your tear damage to it
t117.title: Locust of Conquest
t117.subtitle: I Bring Conquest
t117.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Boss Rush as Apollyon

description: When killing an enemy, you have a very small chance to gain the ability to fly for the rest of the room
t118.title: Bat Wing
t118.subtitle: They Are Growing...
t118.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Greedier Mode with Azazel

description: Sets your red Hearts to 50% of maximum upon traveling to the next floor
If your health is already equal to or above 50%, it heals half a Red Heart instead
t119.title: Stem Cell
t119.subtitle: Regen!
t119.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Greedier Mode with Samson

description: Fully recharges your active item at the start of each boss fight
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Zaratus
t120.title: Hairpin
t120.subtitle: Poke that power outlet! Bosses charge you

description: Gives you the Holy Mantle shield effect at the start of every new floor, which protects you from the next hit of damage you take
Does not recharge until the start of the next floor
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Ep and Mills
t121.title: Wooden Cross
t121.subtitle: My faith protects me

description: Using your active item while holding this trinket will drop it back on a pedestal on the ground
Also after taking damage, you have a very small chance to drop one of your passive items
One-time use active items will be consumed and not dropped
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by MarkusLeben and iguesti
t122.title: Butter!
t122.subtitle: Can't hold it!

description: Holding this trinket will cause the Angel mini bosses to drop normal items instead of Key Pieces
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2, designed by Edmund McMillen
t123.title: Filigree Feather
t123.subtitle: Angelic spoils!

description: While held, the last door Isaac went through stays open, allowing him to leave the room even if enemies are in it
This trinket works on boss rooms (except Ultra Greed) and devil rooms containing Krampus, allowing you to exit out mid-fight
t124.title: Door Stop
t124.subtitle: Hold the door!

description: After being picked up, a yellow laser chain now flows through Isaac's familiars
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #4 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Strawrat and Aczom
t125.title: Extension Cord
t125.subtitle: Charged friends

description: While held, spawns +1 friendly blue fly every time you pick up a coin
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Eufuu
t126.title: Rotten Penny
t126.subtitle: Wealth of flies
t126.unlock: Unlock this trinket by having a lot of blue flies at once

description: While held this trinket gives your familiars homing shots
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Ink Tears
t127.title: Baby-Bender
t127.subtitle: Feed them magic!
t127.unlock: Unlock this item by having two items or effects that grant homing shots at once (e.g. Spoon Bender, Telepathy for Dummies, I - The Magician)

description: While held, gives you a small chance to gain a bone heart everytime you take damage
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5
REPENTANCE - Finger Bone's chance to grant a bone heart has been increased to 5% per hit taken (from 2%)
t128.title: Finger Bone
t128.subtitle: It looks brittle
t128.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Ultra Greed as The Forgotten

description: Tears have a chance to become a tooth, dealing more than triple damage
t129.title: Jawbreaker
t129.subtitle: Don't chew on it

description: Tears have a chance to slow enemies
t130.title: Chewed Pen
t130.subtitle: It's leaking

description: Chance to spawn half a soul heart when picking up a coin
The chance scales up based on the coin's worth: Penny = 16.66%, Double Penny = 30.5%, Nickel = 59.7%, Dime = 83.3%
t131.title: Blessed Penny
t131.subtitle: Wealth of purity
t131.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating ??? as Bethany

description: Gives you a random syringe effect every room
The effect can be The Virus, Roid Rage, Speed Ball, Experimental Treatment, Synthoil, Euthanasia or Growth Hormones
t132.title: Broken Syringe
t132.subtitle: Mystery medicine

description: Placed bombs explode almost instantly
This was called Exploded Firecracker in Antibirth
t133.title: Short Fuse
t133.subtitle: Short fuse

description: Farts produced by Isaac or familiars will be twice as large
t134.title: Gigante Bean
t134.subtitle: Mega farts

description: Chance for enemies to burn when entering a room
The chance for this effect to activate is effected by your Luck stat
t135.title: A Lighter
t135.subtitle: Watch the world burn

description: Explosions can open locked doors
This includes key blocks and golden chests
t136.title: Broken Padlock
t136.subtitle: Bombs are key

description: Pickups left on current floor will appear in the starting room of the next floor, up to a maximum of 4 pickups
t137.title: Myosotis
t137.subtitle: Forget me not...

description: Active items will be rerolled upon using them
Using with Book of Virtues will only reroll the item the book is holding
Has no effect with Notched Axe due to how its durability works
t138.title: 'M
t138.subtitle: t's broken9Reroll your dest
t138.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Mother as Eden

description: Random luck-based tear effects have an extra chance of occurring
The additional chance is effectively +3 Luck Up
t139.title: Teardrop Charm
t139.subtitle: It feels lucky

description: Picking up red hearts now has a high chance to spawn 1-4 blue attack spiders, instead of giving you health back
This effect also works while fully healed, giving a guaranteed chance of getting spiders
While missing any red health the chance for spiders is less
Works for characters that don't use red health, which always gives you spiders
Hearts in Shops can be converted into spiders for free
t140.title: Apple of Sodom
t140.subtitle: It feels empty

description: Gives your familiars improved rate of fire while held
In Antibirth this trinket was called Song of the Siren
t141.title: Forgotten Lullaby
t141.subtitle: Sing for your friends
t141.unlock: Unlock this trinket by bombing the skull left by The Siren boss after her death

description: While held at the start of each floor, this trinket spawns four wisp familiar orbitals around Isaac
These wisps are the same as the ones created by the Book of Virtues item
t142.title: Beth's Faith
t142.subtitle: My faith protects me
t142.unlock: Unlock this trinket by beating the Boss Rush as Bethany

description: Your active item no longer gains charges, but battery drops become much more common
t143.title: Old Capacitor
t143.subtitle: Voltage starving
t143.unlock: Unlock this trinket by blowing up 10 Battery Beggars

description: Tears that miss enemies will redirect themselves and travel 90 degrees towards enemies
Tears must be roughly 2 tiles or closer to activate this effect
t144.title: Brain Worm
t144.subtitle: Ding!

description: +10 Luck while held, but the trinket is destroyed when damage is taken
Blood donation machines, Curse Rooms and Sacrifice Rooms wont destroy it
Taking a hit and activating Holy Mantle won't destroy it
Can be dropped in order to avoid breaking it
This trinket is automatically given to you after clearing 3 bosses without taking damage
t145.title: Perfection
t145.subtitle: Luck way up. Don't lose it!

description: Treasure Rooms are replaced with Red Treasure Rooms, which contain a deal with the devil in place of a regular item pedestal
If an item room as not yet been entered, it can be transformed to either a regular or Red Treasure Room by picking up or dropping this trinket before entering
t146.title: Devil's Crown
t146.subtitle: His special customer
t146.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Mother as Azazel

description: Every time you pick up a coin, you have a small chance to gain 1 bar of charge on your active item
In Antibirth this trinket was called Electric Penny
t147.title: Charged Penny
t147.subtitle: Wealth of power
t147.unlock: Unlock this trinket by donating to a battery beggar until he rewards 4.5 Volt

description: While held, your familiars will now orbit around Isaac instead of following behind him
t148.title: Friendship Necklace
t148.subtitle: Gather round

description: If your active item is fully charged, when you take damage it will automatically activate
It doesn't activate for free - the charges are used up as normal if this effect activates
t149.title: Panic Button
t149.subtitle: Push in case of emergency

description: Doors can be opened without using up a key
However, when entering the door you are taken to a blue womb room with enemies to defeat. This room will always drop a reward at the end, then allow you to exit back to the real floor
t150.title: Blue Key
t150.subtitle: Look between the rooms
t150.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating The Beast as Tainted Cain

description: While held this trinket causes spikes to retract into the floor
Works for curse rooms - you no longer take damage entering or leaving
t151.title: Flat File
t151.subtitle: No more spikes

description: +9% chance for a Planetarium to spawn
Allows Planetariums to spawn in the Womb/Utero floors
Planetarium have a base 1% chance to appear, which increases by +20% whenever you skip an Item Room (Must not enter to count as skipped)
After entering a Planetariumm the chance goes back to 1%. Holding this trinket increase that chance by +15%
t152.title: Telescope Lens
t152.subtitle: Seek the stars
t152.unlock: Unlock this trinket by collecting three of the following in the same run: Magic 8 Ball, Tiny Planet, Crystal Ball, Star of Bethlehem or any of the Astrology-related items (e.g. Aries, Cancer, Capricorn, Leo etc.). The item called Zodiac does not count.

description: Has a high chance to give you the effect of a random Mom item every room
t153.title: Mom's Lock
t153.subtitle: A piece of her love
t153.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Isaac, ???, Satan and The Lamb as Tainted Isaac

description: Every time you enter a brand new room, you have a chance to get a random one-time use Dice (e.g. D6, D6, D20 etc.)
t154.title: Dice Bag
t154.subtitle: Bonus roll
t154.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Mother as Tainted Isaac

description: Causes Item rooms and Shops to appear in the Cathedral
t155.title: Holy Crown
t155.subtitle: Walk the path of the saint
t155.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Isaac, ???, Satan and The Lamb as Tainted Magdalene

description: While held you get +1 HP Up
The first time you pick this trinket up, the heart container will be filled. This effect can't be abused - next time it will be empty if dropped
t156.title: Mother's Kiss
t156.subtitle: HP up

description: Every 15 shots you will shoot an Ipecac + My Reflection shot

The tear will fly in the air for about 3 seconds and follows Isaac until it falls and explodes. You need to move out of the way or it will hurt Isaac, but can be used to open anything requiring a bomb e.g. Secret Rooms
t157.title: Torn Card
t157.subtitle: Death awaits
t157.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Mother as Tainted Lazarus

description: Every time you take damage, you drop up to 2 different types of consumables on the ground
Dropped consumables can be any variant of its kind - e.g. a bomb can become a troll bomb, or a dropped coin can become a dime
Does nothing if you have no consumables
t158.title: Torn Pocket
t158.subtitle: A hole in your pocket
t158.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Isaac, ???, Satan and The Lamb as Tainted Lazarus

description: All new chests become locked Golden chests
t159.title: Gilded Key
t159.subtitle: Less is more
t159.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Isaac, ???, Satan and The Lamb as Tainted Cain

description: Spawns a sack at the start of each new floor
t160.title: Lucky Sack
t160.subtitle: Free goodies!
t160.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Mother as Tainted Cain

description: Causes Item rooms to appear in Sheol
t161.title: Wicked Crown
t161.subtitle: Walk the path of the wicked
t161.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Isaac, ???, Satan and The Lamb as Tainted Azazel

description: When entering a new room, gives a small chance to gain Azazel's short-range Brimstone laser for the current room and the ability to fly
t162.title: Azazel's Stump
t162.subtitle: Unleash your inner demon
t162.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Mother as Tainted Azazel

description: Spawns 2 friendly Dips upon clearing a room
Dips that spawn after killing a Squirt turn friendly
t163.title: Dingle Berry
t163.subtitle: Oops!
t163.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Isaac, ???, Satan and The Lamb as Tainted Blue Baby

description: Drops 2 bombs at once (only 1 bomb is removed from your total)
t164.title: Ring Cap
t164.subtitle: Twice the bang!
t164.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Mother as Tainted Blue Baby

description: Beyond the womb floor, all pickups are replaced with a random pickup as follows:
Bomb - 26.6% chance. Heart - 26.6% chance
Pill - 16.6% chance. Card - 16.6% chance
Trinket - 6.6% chance. Battery - 6.6% chance
Essentially just removes keys from the drop table
t165.title: Nuh Uh!
t165.subtitle: Don't want!
t165.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Isaac, ???, Satan and The Lamb as Tainted Eden

description: Each brand new room, this trinket has a chance to transform into a copy of a random passive item, which gives you the effect for the duration of this room
t166.title: Modeling Clay
t166.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Mother as Tainted Eden

description: Gives a small chance to spawn a friendly Bony when clearing a room, which will throw bones at enemies until it takes enough damage to die
Can be either the regular white Bony or the black variant
t167.title: Polished Bone
t167.subtitle: Friends from beyond
t167.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Isaac, ???, Satan and The Lamb as Tainted Forgotten

description: Gives you +1 Bone Heart every time you enter a new floor
t168.title: Hollow Heart
t168.subtitle: A brittle blessing
t168.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Mother as Tainted Forgotten

description: Counts as 1 of 3 cat items needed towards the Guppy transformation
Dropping this trinket again removes the transformation if you dont have 3 other Guppy items
t169.title: Kid's Drawing
t169.subtitle: Looks familiar...
t169.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Isaac, ???, Satan and The Lamb as Tainted Lost

description: Each time you clear a room there is a chance a Red Room will spawn at one of the walls.
The chance for a Red Room to unlock increases as you pick up more Crystal Keys.
While in a regular room, the chances to spawn a Red Room are: 1 Key = 33.33% chance. 2 keys = 50% chance. 3 or more keys = 100% chance.
While in a Red room, the chances to spawn a Red Room are: 1 Key = 12.5% chance. 2 keys = 16.6% chance. 3 keys = 25% chance. 4 keys = 50% chance. 5 keys = 100% chance.
Passive rooms with no enemies don't have a chance to spawn Red Rooms.
It's possible to hold more than one trinket by taking Mom's Purse, Belly Button or using the Smelter to convert them into passive items. Having a golden version of this trinket counts as 2 keys.
t170.title: Crystal Key
t170.subtitle: Call to the other side
t170.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Mother as Tainted Lost

description: Has a decent chance for Devil Deals to cost money instead of Health
The conversion rate is 1 heart container to 15 coins
Items can be on discount similar to the shop, making it 1 heart container = 7 coins instead
Can be dropped to disable this effect while in the room
t171.title: Keeper's Bargain
t171.subtitle: Money talks
t171.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Isaac, ???, Satan and The Lamb as Tainted Keeper

description: While held, you will be teleported to a random room everytime you pick up a coin
t172.title: Cursed Penny
t172.subtitle: Wealth of misery
t172.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Mother as Tainted Keeper

description: Allows you to pay for a devil deal with this trinket
t173.title: Your Soul
t173.subtitle: Give it to me
t173.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Isaac, ???, Satan and The Lamb as Tainted Judas

description: +10% devil room chance while held
t174.title: Number Magnet
t174.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Mother as Tainted Judas

description: Opens the door to the Blue Womb, regardless of whether you meet the 30 minute speed timer
Opening Pandora's Box while holding this item will ignore the normal effect and instead spawn 6 item pedestals from random item pools. Both the box and trinket are consumed when this happens
t175.title: Strange Key
t175.subtitle: What could it open?
t175.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Isaac, ???, Satan and The Lamb as Tainted Eve

description: A small clot friend will hug Isaac, following his exact movements (similar to how Jacob & Esau work) and shooting tears when he does
The clot can be moved around by collision with an object/wall, allowing you to re-position it
The clot's damage is roughly 1/3 of your tear damage
If it takes a few hits it will die, and respawn in the next room
t176.title: Lil Clot
t176.subtitle: Mini friend
t176.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Mother as Tainted Eve

description: Spawns a random chest after completing a regular Challenge Room
Spawns a pedestal item after completing a boss Challenge Room
t177.title: Temporary Tattoo
t177.subtitle: You feel braver
t177.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Isaac, ???, Satan and The Lamb as Tainted Samson

description: When taking damage you have a chance to explode and deal 185 damage to all enemies around you (Same damage as a Mr. Mega bomb)
t178.title: Swallowed M80
t178.subtitle: Bang!
t178.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Mother as Tainted Samson

description: Familiars follow Isaac's exact movements, (similar to how Jacob & Esau work) instead of following loosely like they usually do
Holding the drop button (Ctrl on Steam version) causes them to stop moving
Doesn't affect some familiars with specific movement patterns, e.g. Abel
t179.title: RC Remote
t179.subtitle: Controllable buddies!
t179.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Isaac, ???, Satan and The Lamb as Tainted Jacob

description: Gives you a familiar that follows Isaac's exact movements (similar to how Jacob & Esau work) and shoots spectral tears
Similar to Jacob and Esau, positions can be altered by running it into objects, or holding the drop button (Ctrl on Steam version)
When you place a bomb, the Found Soul will drop one too
If it takes any damage, it will die and not respawn until the next floor
t180.title: Found Soul
t180.subtitle: Finally!
t180.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Mother as Tainted Jacob

description: Everytime you use your active item, you have a chance to activate another random active item
t181.title: Expansion Pack
t181.subtitle: Fun extras
t181.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Isaac, ???, Satan and The Lamb as Tainted Bethany

description: Taking damage gives you a chance to spawn a flame orbital, similar to the ones created by Book of Virtues
Entering an Angel Room gives you +5 flame orbitals. The angel room spawned by The Stairway item also counts
Giving money to a beggar gives a flame orbital
t182.title: Beth's Essence
t182.subtitle: Virtue's reward
t182.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Mother as Tainted Bethany

description: Upon entering each new room, this trinket has a chance to copy one of your current familiars
If you have no familiars instead it will spawn either Brother Bobby or Sister Maggy
Only lasts for the current room
t183.title: The Twins
t183.subtitle: I'm seeing double...
t183.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Isaac, ???, Satan and The Lamb as Tainted Lilith

description: All shops only sell familiars while holding this trinket
If you enter a shop while holding this trinket, the effect won't undo by dropping it until you move to a new floor
t184.title: Adoption Papers
t184.subtitle: Give them a home
t184.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Mother as Tainted Lilith

description: Every time an enemy dies you have a chance to gain a random Locust
Different color Locusts correspond to the horsemen. Each of them deal double your tear damage, similar to how standard blue flies work
War (Red) - Explodes when touching the enemy. The actual explosion deals flat 60 damage
Pestilence (Green) - Poisons the enemy it attacks
Famine (Brown) - Applies a slowing effect
Death (Black) - Deals x4 damage instead of x2
Conquest (White) - Spawns 2-5 at once
t185.title: Cricket Leg
t185.subtitle: Infested
t185.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Isaac, ???, Satan and The Lamb as Tainted Apollyon

description: Gives you a red attack fly, that will charge at enemies in the same direction you are shooting
Deals damage equal to your current tear damage
Stops charging once it hits an enemy and returns to Isaac's side
t186.title: Apollyon's Best Friend
t186.subtitle: Attack buddy
t186.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Mother as Tainted Apollyon

description: Gives a 33% chance to spawn an extra blind pedestal item in all future item rooms. This one will be a hidden question mark
Allows you to see what both items are on alternative path floors (Downpour/Dross, Mines/Ashpit, Gehenna/Mausoleum)
t187.title: Broken Glasses
t187.subtitle: Double vision?
t187.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating challenge #40 (Seeing Double)

description: Gives a small chance for your tears to freeze enemies in place
Frozen enemies can be pushed into obstacles where they shatter on contact and fire ice shards around them. Any other enemies hit by these shards will become frozen too
Frozen enemies are considered dead by the game, and won't unfreeze or move again. The room doors will open if only frozen enemies remain
t188.title: Ice Cube
t188.subtitle: Stay frosty
t188.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating challenge #41 (Pica Run)

description: Every time you kill an enemy you get an invincibility shield for 2 seconds
t189.title: Sigil of Baphomet
t189.subtitle: Revel in death
t189.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating challenge #37 (Bloody Mary)
